titles.title: What a beautiful name it is

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You were the Word at the beginning
One with God the Lord most high
Your hidden glory in creation
Now revealed in You our Christ

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
What a beautiful name it is 2x
The name of Jesus Christ my King

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
What a beautiful Name it is
nothing compares to this
What a beautiful Name it is the
Name of Jesus

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
You didnt want heaven without us
So Jesus You brought heaven down
My sin was great Your love was greater
What could seperate us now

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
What a wonderful Name it is 2x
The Name of Jesus Christ my King

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
What a wonderful Name it is
Nothing compares to this
What a wonderful Name it is the Name
of Jesus

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Death could not hold you the veil tore before You
You silenced the boast of sin and grave

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
The heavens are roaring the praise of Your glory
For you are raised to life again

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
You have no rival You have no equal
Now and forever God you reign

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
Yours is the Kingdom Yours is the glory
Yours is the Name above all names

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
What a powerful name it is
What a powerful name it is
The name of Jesus Christ my King

verse.name: v12
verse.lines:
What a powerful name it is
Nothing can stand against
What a powerful name it is
The name of Jesus
